title: Crossroads of life
creator_credit: Henri Storck and United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: Hihglights several cases of children with serious problems, who are helped to understand their needs and become healthier people. After becoming delinquent, they are treated in a children’s institution. Scenes show therapeutic work to help them relieve aggressive feelings. International cooperation to improve methods of prevention, observation and treatment of delinquency is urged.
